Package io.werval.api.exceptions

Exceptions.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary  
    Exception Description
    ActivationException
    Activation Exception.
    IllegalRouteException
    Thrown when trying to build a Route instance with an illegal route string.
    ParameterBinderException
    Thrown when something goes wrong when using ParameterBinders.
    PassivationException
    Passivation Exception.
    RouteNotFoundException
    Thrown when no satisfying Route found.
    TemplateException
    Thrown when something goes wrong when resolving or rendering a Template.
    WervalException
    Base exception for all werval errors.
